useCase.name: View List of Absences

successEndConditions.condition: List of absences is successfully displayed

useCase.trigger: User accesses the absence list page

mainSequence.step: User navigates to the absence list page
System retrieves the root route for absence list page
System fetches all absences for the logged-in user
System renders the list of absences on the "Vista list.ejs" view
System displays the absence list in the web browser
